mapper.select: SELECT l.user_id, l.community_board_id, l.reg_date, m.title FROM BOARD_LIKE_LIST l INNER JOIN COMMUNITY_BOARD m ON l.community_board_id = m.community_board_id INNER JOIN USERS u ON l.user_id = u.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.reg_date DESC
mapper.delete: delete from BOARD_LIKE_LIST where community_board_id = #{boardId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from BOARD_LIKE_LIST where community_board_id = #{boardId} and user_id = #{userId}
